# Output figure in HTML5
if (knitr::is_html_output()) knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  plot = function(x, options) {
    cap  <- options$fig.cap  # figure caption
    tags <- htmltools::tags
    as.character(tags$figure(
      tags$img(src = x, alt = cap),
      tags$figcaption(cap)
    ))
  }
)
